text: LGTM, besides the comment on testing all cases.
LGTM then.

Travis failure is because of compatibility issues with nibabel .get_affine and .affine

I removed get_affine because we plan to bump nibabel to 2.0.2 which I think should be fine after PR #1534 is merged.
AppVeyor failure is unrelated and should be fixed with PR #1535
Should FIX issue #1250

>Can you rebase on master, so that hopefully the tests pass.

Rebased. Travis is passed and waiting for CircleCI to be passed.
